scripts.tf-dev: cd infrastructure && terraform init -backend-config 'storage_account_name=ameddin73devtfstate' && terraform apply -var-file variables/dev.tfvars.json
scripts.tf-prd: cd infrastructure && terraform init -backend-config 'storage_account_name=ameddin73prdtfstate' && terraform apply -var-file variables/prd.tfvars.json
